description: An insulating and moisture-wicking fleece hoodie – perfect as a mid layer for all-year-round activities. Made from a recycled polyester and traceable wool blend. Reinforced with G-1000 Eco over the shoulders for extra durability in high-wear areas.
name: Fjallraven Keb Fleece Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: Two-way front zipper; improved hood construction; traceable wool and recycled polyester; updated fit that allows for easy layering underneath
